page.title: 16STOCKTON -- OUR TOWN.
page.content: The things I like best about Stockton are that there are quite a few clothes shops, it's got a good night life, plenty of supermarkets and The Green Dragon Yard Museum which tells us much about the history of Stockton. Many older streets have been modernised. There is a nice town hall in the centre with The Shambles market. There is a large shopping precinct, plenty of banks and building societies. There are pool clubs and amusements for young and old. However there is not enough night life for teenagers unlike nearby Billingham. There are lots of parks to go to but there are always skinheads gluesniffing. I don't like the running fights through the town between skinheads and Joeys. There are not many sports facilities. There is an annual regatta and folklore festival and Chrismas tree and lights.
